triples.name: Language model
triples.relevance: Cicero integrates a language model as a core component for generating natural language dialogue during negotiations.

triples.name: Reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: Reinforcement learning algorithms are used to train Cicero's strategic decision-making alongside planning.

triples.name: Automated planning and scheduling
triples.relevance: Planning algorithms enable Cicero to infer players' intentions and generate coherent strategic moves.

triples.name: Natural language processing
triples.relevance: NLP techniques allow Cicero to understand and process natural language communications from other players.

triples.name: Diplomacy (game)
triples.relevance: Diplomacy is the strategic board game that Cicero learns to play at human-level performance.

triples.name: Intelligent agent
triples.relevance: Cicero is a novel intelligent agent that combines language models with strategic reasoning for human-level negotiation and gameplay.
